text:
A very nice convenience store located Under BT Centre.
They have a decent variety of items stocked. I'm sure you will find most of the things you need.
The staff is very friendly and helpful too.
There is a Bus Stop right outside the store as well.

Located in BT Centre on the ground floor and facing the Main Street. Friendly staff and good selection of snacks and basic amenities. Food and drinks are at a good price with further discounts for bulk purchases. Have both indoors and outdoors dining area for a quick bite and drinks.

Small little shop, items are reasonably priced, cheaper than 7-11 for sure. E.g Pokka 500ml cost $1.20 at Umart while it cost $2.20 at 7-11 . Has a variety of goods from swimwear to batteries to instant noodles. Theres is also nice spot for eating and doing work if you want, comes with power plugs.
It was a nice 24-hour store. You can find everything of your need in good prices. At least better than expensive cheers stores across the road.
The owner was very warm and friendly, well stocked for your daily need. Has couple of tables outside and inside to enjoy their instant foods, all were great
